periods.shortForecast: Mostly Clear then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 1am. Mostly clear, with a low around 66. South wind 0 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 7am and 10am, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Partly sunny. High near 84, with temperatures falling to around 81 in the afternoon. Southeast wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

periods.name: Wednesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 65. East wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.
